p: Client of ours in modern Downtown office are in need of a Data Scientist to leverage Salesforce technology for a very large and changing data set.
p.2: Data manipulation and reporting is critical in this role and if you are someone that lives in the data then this role is for you, as it is not a business facing role.

li.2: Investigate and report data inconsistencies and anomalies
li.3: Perform bulk data management as necessary
li.5: Compare data to innovate new ways of evolving our systems
li.6: Work closely with Senior Systems Analyst on ad hoc requests
li.7: Gathering and presenting data to establish the truth about processes and consistency
li.8: Daily communication with team members to communicate findings
li.9: Perform queries on data to offer quick insight and help with decision-making

strong: Your experience that will pique their interest include:

li: Have advanced skills in Domo and/or SQL
li.1: Be analytical and passionate about learning how data drives business and solutions
li.2: Be able to read and tell the data story through the eyes of the business
li.3: Have some Salesforce Experience, preferably with Reports and Dashboards
li.4: Be curious, creative and communicative =E2=80=93 open to learning

p.8: The environment is energetic and collaborative (much like a start up) and does require (COVID vaccinated with booster) people who are able to come to the office 4 days a week for this fulltime role Competitive compensation and unique benefits offered.
